metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33068 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer overflow in the component hb-ot-shape-fallback.cc of Harfbuzz v4.3.0 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via unspecified vectors.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> openjdk-lts builds with the system harfbuzz

criterions.comment: harfbuzz: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'reached end-of-life').
icedtea-web package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-16 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-17 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-18 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-8 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
